text: I'm going to be late; I missed my train. Go ahead without me.
Yeah! Do it and I'll pay you back later.
Get the red one, they are ðŸ’¯
What are you taking to Sara's housewarming party? Are you even going? Tuesdays are dragon-fighting days!
Janae is going to be late, because she lost her house key again. I think she might try to blame it on the train, but I'm literally standing next to her as she's looking for her keys ðŸ˜‚
Did you get the red one? Tell me you got the red one.
Sara is holding a housewarming party next week; we should go. Yes, I know it clashes with your weekly D&D game, but this is like her first house move since we met her.

Hello you beautiful people! I'm having a housewarming party next Tuesday, and you're all invited! Please bring something to drink. And some food. And yourself haha! But seriously bring some food, I have nothing.
Don't forget to get a present for the dog's birthday; you know your father takes it very seriously.
